title: WhatsApp call not working
content:
Hello,

I tried to make a whatsapp call but I got the error below:

"Couldn't place call. Make sure your phone has an internet connection and try again"

I am sure that my internet connection is working and have tried turning on and off my mobile data, using wi-fi instead of my mobile data and reboot many times but nothing works. In fact, the intended recipient of my call saw my missed call but can't pick up the call. I would appreciate if anyone can let me know what's the solution to this issue. My phone is a Google pixel 3 and my android version is 9.

Thanks,
Stanley
